nodes.text: The Yaga Minor shipyards were the galaxy renowned ship building facilities of Yaga Minor.
During the rein of Grand Admiral Thrawn, the shipyards were fully under his control, under his orders, the shipyards were to begin production of Imperial-class Star Destroyers.
By the signing of the Bastion Accords, the Yaga Minor shipyards were the Imperial Remnant's last shipyard.
During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the shipyards was also affiliated with the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances.
They would later be under the control of the Fel Empire, and later Empire-in-exile.
